original_title: Sri Lanka awards CFM engine repair deal to Lufthansa Technik
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka’s cabinet has approved the award of a contract to repair engines of Srilankan Airliness’ aircraft to Germany’s Lufthansa Technik AG, a statement said.
Three CFM Leap-1A engines will be repaired under the contract.
The contract was awarded after getting three responses for limited competitive bids.
The cabinet had approved the proposal made by the Minister of Aviation. (Colombo/ May09/2023)
